name: RaGaBa
description:
You are lost in an unfamiliar place, and an endless stream of monsters is coming at you from every direction.

Throw your own bodyparts to slay your foes or make them explode by clicking while paying close attention to their color as well as their varied patterns.

The longer you survive, the harder it gets!

Let your reflexes be put to the test in this infinite action arcade game!

___________________________________________________________________________

Key features:

  • Mouse only gameplay!
  • Trhow your own bodyparts
  • Each bodypart has a color, and so do your foes. Adapt your strategy quickly to throw the corresponding color without getting hit!
  • Scoring system
  • 2 Difficulty settings
  • 7 types of relentless monsters
  • More than 50 different waves of ennemies
  • Increasing difficulty
  • Infinite gameplay! (as long as you can stay alive ;)

___________________________________________________________________________

How to play:

  • Left click anywhere on the screen to throw your current bodypart in the desired direction.
  • Right click to hold monsters or yourself in place.
  • Anything held for long enough will take damage!
  • Colorless monsters are the exception: They cannot be held. Mash right click to destroy them!
